caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. In a room with candles on the table, two men are sitting face to face, engaging in a relaxed and pleasant conversation. They are seated at a table, and one of them is leaning back in his chair. Both are dressed in black attire, and they are discussing something. Meanwhile, in another location, two women are in conversation. One of the women is seated, while the other woman is standing and braiding her hair. She discovers something and tells the seated woman, who appears very shocked. At night, by a bonfire, two men are engaged in conversation. It seems like one of them is teaching the other something. In another location, at a training ground, several people are sparring or engaging in combat.
